A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Okay\, for those of you that grew up\, like I\, a SW nut..think this through. I see the low ratings fan rating and it’s disappointing. Manly because your anger and frustration is pointed at the wrong place. We all wanted the continuing story of Luke\, Leia and Han and never got it. Lucas sat on for 16 years and the best out CREATOR could give us was Jar Jar Binks and a horrible Anakin Skywalker storyline?!? Then I remembered the Ewoks\, friggin awful. Lucas ran out of ideas for the magnificent universe he creates. I think Disney is doing its best to carry forth a story it’s creator cares little for. In short\, this is a solid movie in the Star Wars universe...hands down.
